traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The battleaxe is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an {@spell antimagic field}. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the battleaxe must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
entries: While the battleaxe remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal battleaxe.

actions.name: Battleaxe
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1 damage) slashing damage.
